GSD.product_version: versions from v5.13 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
RISC-V: Fixup schedule out issue in machine_crash_shutdown()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 150573c60c021b2c0051d55976f190df1064bd08, it was introduced in version v5.13 by commit e53d28180d4d0fd12b6d2bde49cb87aa775b6ba8. For more details please see the references link.
